document_data.caption: A map of Mulhorand showing Jhalhoran on the River of Shadows.
document_data.name: Jhalhoran
document_data.mainbody: '''Jhalhoran''' was a city located in the country of [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: Jhalhoran was located on the north bank of the [[River of Shadows]] in central Mulhorand. It sat on the [[Great South Road]] in between [[Surbroar]] to the south and [[Maerlar]] to the north.
document_data.Inhabitants: The precept of Jhalhoran in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, was a [[priest]] of [[Nephthys]] named [[Ulara]]. [[Nephita]], the [[incarnation]] of Nephthys, lived here at this time as well.
document_data.Activities: Jhalhoran was a major center of worship for [[Osiris]].
